channel.title: Attacking through walls
channel.description: hey guys, i have a problem. you can range/mage through walls how do i fix this npc and players is noclipped btw.

item.title: Attacking through walls
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

If they’re “noclipped” well, then that’s your problem.

I think you mean they “are clipped”.

You need to add clipping for range projectiles.
A quick google search gave me the following:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/372468-clipping-checks-clipped-projectiles-clipped-npcs.html
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/387812-clipped-projectiles-pi-version.html
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/484711-projectile-clipping.html

Read full topic
